solution_line_template: The pizza costs ${base_pizza_cost} and the first topping, pepperoni costs ${first_topping_cost} so right now it costs {base_pizza_cost}={first_topping_cost} = ${cost_after_first_topping}

The next {num_next_toppings} toppings, sausage and ham, cost ${cost_per_next_topping} each so {num_next_toppings}*{cost_per_next_topping} = $<<{num_next_toppings}*{cost_per_next_topping}={cost_next_two_toppings}>>{cost_next_two_toppings}

The remaining toppings, olives, mushrooms, bell peppers and pineapple, cost ${cost_per_remaining_topping} each so they cost {num_remaining_toppings}*{cost_per_remaining_topping} = $<<{num_remaining_toppings}*{cost_per_remaining_topping}={cost_remaining_toppings}>>{cost_remaining_toppings}
The pizza is sliced into {num_slices} pieces and the pizza costs ${total_pizza_cost} so each slice costs {total_pizza_cost}/{num_slices}= ${cost_per_slice} a slice
